website_summaries.verdict: Clinically researched and formulated treatment shampoo with biotin and DHT blockers to prevent hair loss and support regrowth.
pros: USDA biobased certified product with organic ingredients
Clinically researched levels of hair growth vitamins including biotin to condition hair shafts and support hair regrowth
Also  blocks DHT, which is implicated in hair loss
Safe for men and women of all ages
FDA certified, with no animal testing
Made in FDA/GMP-certified labs.100% money-back guarantee if not satisfied
cons: Small percentage (10% to 15%) noted no improvement in thinning hair

website_summaries.verdict: This Pronexa anti-hair loss shampoo contains high levels of hair growth vitamins such as biotin for maximum hair regrowth and health.
pros: This shampoo is great for healthy hair growth as well as preventing dryness
Biotin increases the elasticity of the hair cortex, which strengthens hair follicles
Hair is able to  grow longer and thicker
Makes hair look and feel fuller

customer_reviews.title: Decreased hair loss
customer_reviews.text: While I haven’t noticed new hair growth, I am very happy to see a huge decrease in the amount of hair falling out when I combed it after shampooing. (Before I startedusing this shampoo and while using this shampoo I always use a detangler conditioner unaffiliated with this product so the decrease is n hair loss wasn’t because of less knotting or pulling. ). Now there’s virtually no hair loss. My hair also feels much thicker and more textured. I wash my hair 2-3x/week. It took about 2 months to get to this point.
customer_reviews.author: joyce bellish

customer_reviews.title: Decreased Hair Loss
customer_reviews.text: Within a few weeks of using this product I noticed a decrease in the amount of hair loss that I was experiencing.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin A Culpepper

customer_reviews.title: Prevents hair loss and helps to regrow it
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I notice I did not lose as much hair while washing my hair and when I brushed it since the very first time I used it.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Maria Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!
customer_reviews.text: I felt my hair feeling healthier! Definitely want to keep using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Will try later
customer_reviews.text: This product seems work on me. I used it for two months, and still will try it in the future. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: jingxue

customer_reviews.title: Less hair loss and hair feels healthy and full
customer_reviews.text: I waited to write this review until I used the product for 3+ months. I have tried at least 5 other hair loss shampoos and this one is my favorite. I definitely notice a lot less hair loss when I wash my hair with this shampoo. As a matter of fact, it's close to none. My hair feels healthy and full. I would recommend this product to others.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Finally something that actually works!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the shampoo and conditioner for my son who is so young to start going bold!! He uses them daily, and I'm amazed of the difference!!!! I took pictures of before the use and another one after 2 month of use, and his bold spots are regrowing hair. We are about to order again, the shampoo and conditioner lasted him 3 months with daily use. I tried uploading those pictures, but it's not going through.. I'll try posting the pictures again if my phone will let me. This product is worth the money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mona

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I am thirty four years old and have recently noticed that my hair is thinning in the front. I purchased pronexa and have found that with regular use there is significantly less hair in my shower drain than before and I’m even seeing some new growth in areas that were previously balding! I plan to buy this product again as other brands just don’t seem to actually deliver the same results. Thanks for a quality product
customer_reviews.author: Edward Foster

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Using in conjunction with the conditioner and hair vitamins. I liked the difference in the feel of my hair after the first use.
customer_reviews.author: Ctreece

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: I've been trying biotin shampoos for a long time and this one is the only one that really WORKS!
customer_reviews.author: Caro

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, does the job as expected!
customer_reviews.text: Super nice product! So far, the best shampoo I have ever used! Does the job as expected. Will definitely buy again and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: HairArtist

customer_reviews.title: Will purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to say if it re-grows hair, but I have noticed less hair falling out and the hair that does fall out is longer, suggesting a longer growth cycle. I'm using it with an MSM supplement, so I can't attribute the success to one or both, but I've purchased the shampoo twice and will purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: M.M.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this product but i always have problems with the shipping
customer_reviews.author: imelda cardona

customer_reviews.title: and looks better already. Product is easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Received the product a day early; after a short time of use, I'm already noticing the results! Hair feels thicker, and looks better already. Product is easy to use, leaves no scent or residue, and I'm extremely pleased. I've tried several products - this is a keeper!
customer_reviews.author: Charles Littlefield

customer_reviews.title: pretty good!
customer_reviews.text: It smells good, it gives you a feeling of freshness on your head. after you dry your hair, you can feel how soft it is and smelling good This is the second month in which I am using it, so far I have not seen great results but I will be sharing more when it takes about 6 months to see real results.
customer_reviews.author: PABLO

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I had a problem about my weak hair and loosing it. After I use this shampoo, I have better looking hair. I also recognize that less hair loss.
customer_reviews.author: Tulin Ceceli

customer_reviews.title: Noticed less hair falling out...
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have been using Pronexa’s Hairgenics Hair Gowth Shampoo and Conditioner for about one month now. We like how clean and shinny it leaves our hair. We have noticed less hair falling out and a little more hairline growth. We will continue to use for another month to see if it really is making a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne C. Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: I love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this shampoo daily for 2 months now, and I love it. I use both shampoo and conditioner, and it works well. You don't need to use a lot and that makes it last longer. If you follow directions on the bottle, you can see how your hair and scalp absorbs it. I really like how soft my hair feels after each use.
customer_reviews.author: PETER

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous product!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product! I noticed less hair losing after using it the first week. Good things come in small bottles though... I would prefer a larger size bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Jose L Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: Potential
customer_reviews.text: I like the way it lathers and my hair seems very manageable. We will see how the hair growth goes.... to be continued.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Brink

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be working.
customer_reviews.text: Used for six months and hair is looking thicker. Ordering another bottle to see how good things get.
customer_reviews.author: Hamish

customer_reviews.title: Love this shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: My hair feels great after using this shampoo and there is much less shedding!
customer_reviews.author: L. S.

customer_reviews.title: very very very good
customer_reviews.text: What is good is making the hair thick and strong and i like the smell of the product . i love it
customer_reviews.author: Abdul Rauf

customer_reviews.title: Fuller hair, good scent & gentle to the sculp.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product in March & had the chance to test it for 2 month so far. Order & shipment was fast & easy. The size of the shampoo bottle was smaller than expected. It is supposed to last for 1 month but based on my experience, it easily lasts 2-3 month with daily use. The scent is pleasant & fresh. After a few days of use the hair gets thicker & has more volume. Dont expect miracles but you can definitively see a difference. My hair is usually very thin & brittle & Pronexa really helped to improve its condition if you let it stay in your hair for 2-3 minutes. Very good result for a shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Schulz

customer_reviews.title: This Shampoo Seriously Helps ReGrow Hair!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this shampoo for my husband. As we both are getting older, our hair has been thinning a bit. Since mine is long, you don't notice it much. My husband, on the other hand, has very short hair and it is more noticeable. After trying this out for about a month, I really see a difference! His hair is filling in more and definitely looks thicker! I just ordered another bottle and am hoping to see even more results. I am going to start using it as well! I would post a picture of my husband's hair, but he will NOT let me take pictures of him!
customer_reviews.author: Jasper

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!!!!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I had bariatric sleeve surgery at the end of March 2018. I was told to expect hair loss within the first year. I’ve been using this product for almost 2 weeks and I am losing a lot less hair. I’m hoping with continued use and with help of vitamins my hair loss will stop completely. I would recommend this shampoo to anyone that is having problems with hair loss.
customer_reviews.author: LilaS

customer_reviews.title: Results aren't instant but it works!
customer_reviews.text: With thinning hair due to hormones, I figured I'd give this shampoo a try. It really seems to work! I have new growth in areas where my hair was thinning and it seems to have made my hair stronger. I've purchased 3x so far. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sherri B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have very fine, brittle hair. I was looking for something to hopefully help make my hair a little healthier, and I came across this shampoo. After several months of using the shampoo, conditioner, and pills, I am pleased to say that my hair is definitely much healthier! The shampoo has a nice, clean smell and it leaves my fine, dull hair with a bit more lift. It doesn't make my hair greasy at all, as most other products do, and my stylist has even mentioned how healthy my hair has been looking!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: I, can see new hair growth!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Pronexa’s Hairgenics Hair Growth with the Hairgenics Conditioner for about 2 months now. I love how clean, soft and shinny it leaves my hair. I can see new hair growth!
customer_reviews.author: DF

customer_reviews.title: Definitely working for me!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this shampoo! I have been using it since November and have lots of new hair growth which is a real accomplishment for me. My hair has always been fragile and thin and this shampoo is increasing hair growth and strength in a very noticeable way. The reason I did not take a pic was because I thought it would be like all the rest and do nothing for me. You could see my scalp through my hair on the sides but not anymore. I will continue to use this product and wish I had taken a picture so you could see the improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Maro Daro

customer_reviews.title: It really works!!!
customer_reviews.text: My son used it for few months and found out his bold spot area has hairs growing back. It really works. Highly recommended. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Cool buyer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Noticed much less hair in the shower drain and on the floor after first wash!
customer_reviews.author: San

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: Even after 3 months of using, no decent control on hair fall
customer_reviews.author: Mahesh

customer_reviews.title: Very please with the results.
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant purchasing this shampoo because of the price but I'm glad I did! I've been using it over a month now and actually have new growth in my temple area. I love the smell of it too! It has a nice invigorating feel. The shampoo is light and a little goes a long way. It hasn't left my hair with any static as some other products do. I've been using this along with the conditioner and love the way my hair feels. I have found less hair in the shower too. I'm very happy with it and will purchase it again. Looking to trying the vitamins next.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn A

customer_reviews.title: have seen a difference after 1 month of use
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviewers, the offer of a free bottle for a five star review seemed questionable at best. The shampoo is not cheap so the free bottle was tempting. So, I bought the shampoo over a month ago and have waited to review it. After a month, I have seen a noticeable difference with the thickness of my hair. My hair was very fine and I am pleasantly surprised and so far happy with the results. I hope the recommended period of 6 months will only improve the health of my hair and thicken it more.
customer_reviews.author: SL

customer_reviews.title: Working so far...
customer_reviews.text: I've tried other products from Amazon, some from other outlets, so far Pronexa's products (shampoo and conditioner) do make your hair feel fuller while not drying out your scalp. I just started utilizing these products and have only been using it for a couple of months. I'll give it til the recommended 6 months and update this review then. I would also recommend using a biotin supplement along with Pronexa.
customer_reviews.author: Cliff Dietrich

customer_reviews.title: Shady marketing strategy!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like shady products that ask for 5 stars for a free bottle, so watch out for that. I am using this product for two weeks along with rogain, my scalp is getting darker but not with hair but rather colored skin. If you are like me desparate for a remedy you can try it. But a small bottle for such a price is a NO NO. Won’t buy again. If your product works i would be happy to buy again, I don’t want your free bottle and decieve others, no thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Second time ordering it. My hair feels thicker.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Veglia

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I like this product it helps a lot for my hair loss.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for clarifying
customer_reviews.text: Seems to have taken all the build-up off my hair and left it really soft.
customer_reviews.author: Beth A Butala

customer_reviews.title: I love the smell
customer_reviews.text: I have used a few hair loss products. ( last 2 were Nioxin & Vitamins shampoo, conditioner and their serums) Each brand I tried for minimum 5 months and both brand did not work, still had hair loss. I started using this shampoo along with conditioner and serum. I love the smell, and feel so far I have seen less hair on my brushes and sink. I feel this product feel better on my scalp. I will post future review as I plan to give this enough time like the others I tried.
customer_reviews.author: Trvldog

customer_reviews.title: WASTE OF MONEY and free bottle SCAM
customer_reviews.text: ok so the deal is you buying this product and it comes with a flyer saying that you will get free bottle IF YOU REVIEW 5 STAR! Well I did and it turns out a SCAM. Free product never came, I tried to contact them but nobody respond. About product itself shampoo is too watery and dry your hair out especially if it's bleached. I got conditioner as well but it's not moisturize hair at all. After using the product my hair remind of a straw. Not gonna buy it again, waste of money. And it doesn't help for growing hair try Hair La Vie - awesome product (vitamin blend) hair start regrow within a week and it's 100% organic!
customer_reviews.author: Chloe McKevin

customer_reviews.title: Not a true 5 star rating. They bribe with free product offer.
customer_reviews.text: This product didn’t work for me at all which would be OK except that I went off the 5 star rating. Beware, the five star ratings are all bribed with free product. Note that many of the ratings give 5 stars but say they just received it and its still too soon to tell.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Hart

customer_reviews.title: This shampoo is amazing. I have thin
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo is amazing. I have thin, fine hair and have been losing hair for about a year or so. I shampoo with Pronexa and there's hardly any hair in the drain! I've tried other "hair loss" shampoos and tons of hair is in the drain. I thought I would try Purador shampoo just to change it up, but I had much more hair loss in the shower. So I'm sticking with Pronexa. Definitely use the conditioner too, it helps keep the hair out of the comb too. I also use Minoxidil 5% foam that I buy at Costco to regrow hair and I have tons of hair sprouts all over my head, so that's working as well.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product and my hair is growing again!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT!!!! So far so good with the Pronexa! After a BUTCHER JOB at a hair salon I don't normally go to (I couldn't get in to my stylist just before a cruise) I needed something to get my shoulder length hair back again. The smell is minty and fresh and leaves my hair squeaky clean! I read reviews on this shampoo before buying and noticed the reviews were impressed with the ingredients (compared to other hair growth products). I have noticed a difference in fullness and even length within 2 weeks of using it and I'm starting to smile again! :) I'm going to look for more products from HairGenics because I AM SEEING RESULTS! Whoohoo!
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has been using this for a couple months now. Not only does his hair look and feel nice, there is definitely less scalp visible and more hair growth now than prior to him using this shampoo. I hope these results continue. He has dark hair, so his hair loss was definitely noticeable. He's not the vain type, but who wants to be bald? The rest of his hair seems thicker too. We will continue to buy this.
customer_reviews.author: JMHart

customer_reviews.title: IT CAUSE HAIR FALL
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo is waste of money. My hairs increase falling too much after i start using it. i used conditioner and shampoo together. My hair gets dried so much and i cant even comb due to my hair after i use the shampoo. I will never buy it again
customer_reviews.author: unal coban

customer_reviews.title: First month, so far so good...
customer_reviews.text: I've only been using this for about a month, but I notice that less of my hair is falling out and a few friends have even recently commented on how great my hair looks--a first for me! I'm definitely going to keep trying this shampoo for a couple months more to see what kind of results I have. Will try to post a follow-up then...
customer_reviews.author: Buneeb

customer_reviews.title: It is working
customer_reviews.text: been using for a little over one month and can definitely see less hair in my comb. After blow drying I don't have to de-shed my shirt of all the hair that fell out while I was drying my hair. Measureable decrease in hair in the shower drain. Love the smell, my scalp feels tingly clean after shampooing. Hair is clean, shiny, soft but most of all not falling out. I look forward to better and better results as I continue using Pronexa, would absolutely recommend and will definitely purchase again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Susan C Young

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product about a week ago and already can notice a difference. Immediately I had barely any hair falling out when washing and brushing it and it looks and feels fuller. Can't wait to keep using it and to continue to see the positive results.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: I'm on my 3rd bottle. I love this shampoo. I was doubtful at first, but my hair has definitely been growing. My beautician can't believe how fast its growing. The only downside is getting my roots done more often 😄
customer_reviews.author: Casey Maxson

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shampoo for Hair Loss
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Pronexa for about a month and so far I am very pleased with the shampoo. It has a nice fragrance, cleans hair, works well with curly hair, making it manageable & not coating it or weighing down your hair. I purchased this hair shampoo because my hair has been falling out. I have been taking Viviscal hair growth tablets and along with this shampoo my hair has not been falling out as bad. Hopefully over time these two products will keep my hair from falling out and grow back my normal thickness of hair. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda

customer_reviews.title: Fragrance in a bottle
customer_reviews.text: Smells good but that’s it. Deff not worth the price. Company says u get a free bottle with a 5 star review, not true
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Bronson

customer_reviews.title: Free product for 5 star rating
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my husband based on the great reviews. I was disappointed to see "Get a free bottle" for giving 5 stars on Amazon with my delivery. Most of the 5 star reviews are probably based off of that. I am disappointed because I really wanted to get something that actually worked for my husband. I will give an update within the next month of him using this. I think it's a bit unethical for a company to give out free products in exchange for a 5 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney and Greg

customer_reviews.title: First try and I got Lucky
customer_reviews.text: My pictures don't really help. I been using this for weeks now and following instructions to the T. I have noticed the feel and look of my hair isn't has thin but the best part is I finally see progress on my length of my hair. It seem to stop growing when I temporary cut it short a year ago and I though it was going to stay that way but now I have some hope it will be back longer soon.
customer_reviews.author: RedSonia

customer_reviews.title: Great products that do what they say.
customer_reviews.text: I noticed a few months back that I was finding more hair on the sink in the bathroom than usual. I read all of the reviews on this and the conditioner. They were all positive, so even though the products were a bit pricey, I figured I would give them a try. Boy, am I glad I did. There has been very little fall out lTely and I am very pleased. I recommend these products.
customer_reviews.author: Gingerly36

customer_reviews.title: Good Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: The bottle was securely wrapped and arrived in perfect condition. The smell is not as bad as I thought it might be. I have only been using it for 2 weeks so I there has not been a significant amount of new growth yet, but I am going to continue to use it. It spreads better if you lather it in your hands first before applying to hair. I color my hair and have not noticed any issues with the color stripping or changing after using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work and takes too much
customer_reviews.text: It took entirely too much shampoo to get coverage. The pump is inconvenient especially since I had to pump so many times to get enough to wash my scalp and hair. When in the shower your hands are wet so when you try to pump it it slides out of your hands. The only good thing I will say is that made my hair like silk. My hair felt so clean and soft like never before. Much improvement would make this a better product. I did not notice any hair growth either.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work and I think it may have done damage...
customer_reviews.text: I'll be honest, I've tried alot of these shampoos that say they help regrow hair. None of them really work, however this one is really bad. First of all, it's expensive yet it is very watery. It doesn't lather well and I think it may have caused more damage then it claims to repair. Of all the shampoos I have tried, I would rate this one the lowest. You would be better off going to walmart and getting some baby shampoo rather than this stuff...I would not recommend anyone buy this garbage. I bought this because it had such good reviews...not sure why, it certainly isn't a very good shampoo in my estimation.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Hair looks thicker
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this shampoo (with the conditioner as well) for the past few weeks. I thought there was no way it would make an impact right away, but after about a week of using it every other day or every three days, I could really feel a difference. My hair looked thicker in the areas where it's really thin. My hair has been falling out a little less as well. I don't know yet if this actually does help limit hair loss or stimulate thicker, stronger growth, but it does make what hair you have feel clean and look thicker.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Morrison

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t work for my particular situation
customer_reviews.text: I did not see a change in hair loss in the bathtub drain after using for almost 3 months. HOWEVER., I am on letrozole (post breast cancer) And I am 72 years old. The dermatologist said the hair thinning is definitely the letrozole AND my age. So I honestly don’t know if there is a product that even exists that will treat the circumstances of my thinning hair. It is a nice thick green shampoo with a very pleasant scent. I wanted to include that because I had noticed reviews stating the product differently.
customer_reviews.author: NonnaDonna

customer_reviews.title: Love this shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Love this shampoo! I have tried at least a dozen hair cleansers to help replenish hair growth and this one is seriously the ONLY one I like. It is light and sudsy, with a simple clean scent. You know its working by the subtle tingle as you let it work it's magic. Other brands I tried were seriously thick, made my hair dry and brittle, I actually lost hair. Elated to find this this potent, powerful cleanser that is gentle, leaving my hair and scalp feeling fresh and rejuvenated. Highly recommend you use it with the serum and conditioner as part of your hair replenishment regimen.
customer_reviews.author: Kham

customer_reviews.title: Scalp and Hair dripping with Oil
customer_reviews.text: This product was supposed to grow hair. I could not get past the amount of oil it caused to flow out of my scalp and hair. I called my dermatologist and was told to wash it out of my hair and if the problem persisted, come in to be examined. After washing it several times over two days, the oil stopped. I do have lots of allergies, but did not know to expect this result.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri

customer_reviews.title: It works!!!
customer_reviews.text: My hair was thinning and I didn't like it, who does? I thought it was normal for my age, mid 60's. Tried vitamins, but no improvement. Then I came across this product and thought why not give it a try. After 4 months I noticed a slight change. Now after 8 months, the sparseness is gone. Amazing product. Don't know how it works, but it worked for me. I am so glad that I found it and will continue with it. I feel fortunate because how often do you find a product that really works.
customer_reviews.author: Still learning

customer_reviews.title: Impressed so far
customer_reviews.text: I am excited by this shampoo, as I have only used it for about a week, and I have had almost no hair in my shower drain, after being used to having a lot of hair fall in the shower. It leaves my hair feeling clean, and fuller than normal. I will continue to use and see what further benefits I may get from it. Impressed so far.
customer_reviews.author: Aria

customer_reviews.title: Excited, but cautiously optimistic
customer_reviews.text: I received a bottle of pronexa hair growth product about a week ago and have followed the instructions. I've tried several products promising hair growth over the years with slight results. I'm cautiously optimistic about using this product and hope for similar results as depicted by photos shared by another reviewer.
customer_reviews.author: Kayce

customer_reviews.title: Great Product; Just a little too pricey
customer_reviews.text: Pronexa shampoo is a great product. It is one of the few shampoos I have ever used that does not make my scalp itch. It has no harsh or weird smells. It is only a shampoo--not a 2-and-1 shampoo and conditioner, which I like. I have been using it for a little over a month, so it is hard for me to speak about the product's ability to regrow hair. I will update the review once more time has passed. Additionally, I should note, it only takes a small amount to wash your hair, which, helps to offset the high price. My final thoughts would be to give a try and see how you like it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul J. Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Added volume and notice on my hairbrush that I am not losing much hair anymore.  I expect it will take more time b4 I actually o
customer_reviews.text: Used shampoo for the frist time. Like the extra volume and feel of the hair, have good control. Will have to wait a couple of months b4 I can evaluate any new hair growth. 12/29 My hairdresser says she sees new growth. I think it will take more time b4 I notice it. I only use every other day...maybe I should try it daily. Hair has more volume from the shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: joanbari

customer_reviews.title: Hairgenics : Prevents hair loss more than it grows hair.
customer_reviews.text: Summary: I purchased this product for mild alopecia and male pattern baldness. It works better for preventing hair loss than growing hair. I've used this for 2 years and the product is reasonably effective. Pros: 1) Prevents hair loss. 2) Good quality ingredients. 3) I've had no reactions. Cons: 1) Takes a few weeks to show results.
customer_reviews.author: JKN

customer_reviews.title: Just a waste of money 😫
customer_reviews.text: A big NO! To this product because there is no improvement to my hair. I regret buying the shampoo and the condition. Just a waste of money 😫
customer_reviews.author: Ana P.

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to try Hairgenics Pronexa Clinical Strength Hair Growth & Regrowth Therapy Hair Loss Shampoo after seeing the good reviews. I've been using it for only 2 weeks so I can't attest to how much new growth there is, but I love the way this shampoo makes my hair shine, plus it is easier to comb out (my hair falls just past my shoulders), so I have noticed not as much hair comes out! My hair hair line has definitely receded in spots at the temple areas, I will continue using this product for a minimum of two months and will report back about possible new hair growth.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived open and spilling in the package
customer_reviews.text: The shampoo arrived with the cap half on and the product spilling all into the packaging. At 40$ a bottle you'd think it would arrive in better condition.
customer_reviews.author: brh

customer_reviews.title: Seems to slow and maybe eventually stop my hair loss and thinning
customer_reviews.text: I'm 40 and losing my hair, and this shampoo/conditioner offering seems to slow or even stop the loss, although it's hard to say exactly because I've only been using it a month. I'm hoping that in a few more months there might be some regrowth as I've never used this type of shampoo/conditioner before. Aside from the hair loss situation, the products feel and smell very pleasant, and leave my hair in good shape. I'll circle back in a few months and update whether any growth has occurred.
customer_reviews.author: cts6540

customer_reviews.title: Relaxing About Hair Loss
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo is a life saver! I've been terribly worried after seeing half dollar size clumps of hair on the shower drain. As well as noticing my part is starting to show more on top of my head. Yikes! I was only willing to try products that didn't smell harsh and considered safe. This shampoo fit the bill. Best thing is I have only been using 5-6 times & my hair loss in the shower was greatly reduced! I'm excited to have found this product!
customer_reviews.author: bullchi4

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the shampoo almost every other day. My hair does appear to feel fuller and thicker, but I' not sure how much the shampoo has contributed to it. I did notice that there is less hair on my brushes, so that is a plus. I am not expecting to see "new hairs" and I'm not sure if I would reorder this product. Giving it more time to produce the "extraordinary" results that other reviewers have made.
customer_reviews.author: kimd

customer_reviews.title: WORST SHAMPOO
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo failed everywhere for me. The smell is terrible, it made my scalp itch and it did nothing for adding volume or body to my hair. It contains Aloe Vera which is a high allergen for people who are sensitive to floral or plant products. I returned it and I'm going back to my TIGI BED HEAD SUPERSTAR SHAMPOO.
customer_reviews.author: Carma

customer_reviews.title: Super soft hair after using
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the shampoo for a couple weeks now. I really like it. It makes my hair super soft and I have short hair so I honestly don't even need conditioner. As far as hair growth, which I am hoping to see oh, it is still too early to tell. If I do happen to Siri growth I will come back and update this review.
customer_reviews.author: Randy H

customer_reviews.title: I love this Pronexa!
customer_reviews.text: After using Pronexa Clinical Strength Hair Regrowth Shampoo, my hair is smooth, not frizzy when air or blower dried. I have not had time to realize the regrowth yet, and I am still losing a few hairs as I shampoo, but the texture of my hair is fabulous. As others have said, it does not foam much, but even a small amount cleans completely without needing to foam. I massage my scalp thoroughly with the Pronexa, then leave it in for at least two minutes as I shower. I finish by rinsing out the shampoo. I love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Coco

customer_reviews.title: Best Shampoo Ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best shampoo ever. I have fine thin hair that only gets finer and thinner as I age. The first time I used it, even my husband immediately noticed the difference. I've recommended it to so many other women who all are excited as I am..My hair has body, my scalp no longer shows through, and it brightens the silver streaks, all without drying my hair or my scalp.
customer_reviews.author: C. Adamich

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!!! I am already seen results
customer_reviews.text: I have been suffering some hair loss with age, and have been unhappy about it - so tried this product a while back and have made several repeat orders. I find that it seems to work to, at the least, slow hair loss if not stopping it in its tracks. After several months of using it, my hair seemed fuller. I stopped using it for a while and found that my hairbrush was showing signs of more hair loss again, so recently bought another month's supply and intend not to let it lapse anymore. There are no miracle cures for hair loss, but this product does what it claims to and is safe to use. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Belen

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SCENT - LEAVES HAIR SQUEAKY CLEAN YET SOFT!
customer_reviews.text: Tried the shampoo in conjunction with using Minoxidil - to help me with my thinning hair! I've only been on this regimen for a couple of months - too soon to notice any drastic results yet! What I have noticed, since I started using Pronexa Clinical Strength Hair Growth & Regrowth Therapy Hair Loss Shampoo With Biotin, Collagen, and DHT Blockers for Thinning Hair is that my hair and scalp feels noticeably cleaner. And two nice side benefits I've enjoyed are the pleasant citrusy aroma and the softness which the hair is left with! Add the biotin, collagen, and DHT Blockers, all of which are proven in aiding the regrowth of health hair, and this shampoo should be a winner!
customer_reviews.author: fchamp

customer_reviews.title: It Has Really Helped My Hairloss
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for the past two months and have experienced no further hair loss, just full bodied healthy hair. I can't tell if I Have regrowth since my hair looks fuller and healthier but certainly this product is worth the expense versus much more expensive hair replacement technologies.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I started using the shampoo and conditioner a little over 6 weeks ago. Prior to using the product, I was losing a lot of hair in the shower. I'm not losing as much anymore. Although I had not noticed much regrowth, my hairdresser told me today that I had a lot of new hair growth. My ONLY issue was that it made my ends feel dry, so now I'm only using it on my scalp.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Peary

customer_reviews.title: love Pronexa
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love Pronexa. I have purchased a bottle for my daughter, sister and brother. My hair is not falling out now and it is much fuller. I haven't seen any new hair growth yet. I have been using your product since March and plan on using it indefinitely.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth a try
customer_reviews.text: So the shampoo take some getting used to it almost feels like mouthwash when you first pump it out and then it doesn't sud up a lot what's a lot of more natural shampoos don't anyway. but it also it also didn't rinse out a lot because the hair seems to absorb it & I could feel my hair felt fuller instantly. After it dried and I brushed it out my hair did feel good better than it has been. I don't know that it prevents shedding or anything like that but it is a product that I will continue to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not recoment it
customer_reviews.text: I do not recoment this product but is your money 🤷🏻‍♂️ U gonna loss more hair
customer_reviews.author: christian

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE PRODUCT AND FRAUDULENT CHEAT MARKETING
customer_reviews.text: It gave awful reaction my scalp got so itchy and red. Hair got terribly dried up and really really tangled. They give you a small note if you write a good review they would give you a free bottle. Do not get fooled this. I NO THANK YOU TO GET FREE BOTTLE BECAUSE THE PRODUCT IS NOT ONLY WORKING ALSO GIVE SKIN/SCALP AND HAIR SO THE WORST. STAY AWAY FROM THIS FALSE PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: CHELSEA MAMA

customer_reviews.title: Great product, lousy customer service
customer_reviews.text: I like the product a lot- dealing with hair loss and scalp issues; this really makes my hair and scalp feel clean, and I’ve tried a ton of products Not impressed with their customer service though, the product came with a voucher for a free bottle which they would not honor...
customer_reviews.author: Corinne Grant

customer_reviews.title: Great shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shampoo because my hair was thinning. A LOT. I am quite happy with the results. I wish I'd taken a picture of my head before I started using it. Too late now. But my hair is visibly thicker and fuller. I can't see my scalp any longer. I love it and have just purchased my second bottle.
customer_reviews.author: BookerMom

customer_reviews.title: I'm hopeful... with a disclaimer
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many different products that promise to reduce hair loss and encourage growth. I am hopeful that this combination of shampoo and conditioner will produce results, although I know it may be months before I see them. Therefore I am writing a five-star review, not because I have experienced results, but because I've been offered a free product if I do. That's my disclaimer. The shampoo goes on well and smells nice. I use it as directed (leave on for 2 minutes before rinsing). I am also taking hair specific vitamins. I am a 65 year old woman with significantly thinning hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly... it kinda worked!
customer_reviews.text: I was very hesitant of this product after buying it on Amazon. Even after the first month or so I was not seeing progress. However, after several months I can attest that my hairless has significantly subsided. I know it works too because I could kick myself for not bringing some of this product along when I recently went on a vacation. As soon as I stopped using this product for a few weeks hairloss came back. Luckily I'm back stateside and using Pronexa again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: I have very thinning hair and am very self-conscious. I think Pronexa shampoo has made my hair look fuller. Since I haven't been using it long I can't say if it is actually helping renewed growth. After three weeks of use I do feel that my hair looks fuller and thicker, and will continue to use this shampoo because my hair just looks better. It is worth the cost to me!!
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Half empty bottles.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what happened to my package but the bottles were half empty. For what I paid I want full bottles. Seems like it leaked out at pump dispenser shaft.
customer_reviews.author: LORRI

customer_reviews.title: Organic product, helps keep the hair uplift and comfort the scalp
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my gf, and these were her comments! : I like the product a lot after using it for several weeks. My hair is thin and fine. So it usually becomes a little oily one or two days after shampooing. This shampoo helps to keep it uplift even after two days, which is the most important thing I want from a shampoo. Moreover, my scalp feels very comfortable after using it. It sometimes feels itchy to non-organic products, so I think this product is organic as it claimed. I'm not sure about whether it'll eventually help grow my hair, since I just use for only a few weeks. but I'd love to buy another bottle and keep trying.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Lee

customer_reviews.title: Good shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Very good shampoo. Has a minty scent and leaves hair very soft. Not sure about the regrowing properties yet, but I'm sure it'll help bc it contains saw palmetto and that's a dht blocking ingredient. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Castom

customer_reviews.title: Good for my sensitive scalp
customer_reviews.text: I have female pattern baldness and very sensitive skin. This shampoo does not have sodium lauryl sulfate which may irritate my scalp. Many shampoos cause my scalp to itch and thus my hair falls out. This shampoo feels good to my scalp and makes my hair feel very soft. My hair is white and this shampoo does not discolor it at all. I get compliments on my hair. I have waited until I used my first bottle to see if I wanted to continue using it. I do.
customer_reviews.author: DWG

customer_reviews.title: helps my itchy scalp.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Pronexa for eleven days. I'm not positive if it helps my hair growth but it help s with my itchy scalp. I think because of using products to help my itchy scalp caused my hair loss. The shampoo has a great scent and leaves my hair soft. I'll keep on using it till it's gone. I hope I can get a free bottle from the manufacturer. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie

customer_reviews.title: Diminished Hair Loss
customer_reviews.text: I've waited to a write review, as I've been using for 1 month now. I've noticed a significant decrease in the loss of hair when washing, or styling it. My hair is more manageable and styles easier. I have not noticed hair growth yet, but figure I have to use for another few months to see new growth. I will definitely keep using along with my vitamin regimen.
customer_reviews.author: Bulldog Mama

customer_reviews.title: Not working for me
customer_reviews.text: I don't like anything about this product. It's not a good quality product, I don't like the texture, the color, or the scent. Also, my hair is falling more now than before I started using it. I'm definitely discontinuing its use and buying something different. It's really disappointing because it was quite expensive. I wonder if I got a knock off. I do not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Isabel Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Mint scent
customer_reviews.text: It may do what it says (hard to evaluate), but it should say somewhere that it smells like mint. Those of us who hate the smell of mint would appreciate (and probably those who are looking for it as well!). It is not mentioned anywhere in the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: anon

product_meta.title: Hairgenics Pronexa Clinical Strength Hair Growth & Regrowth Therapy Hair Loss Shampoo With Biotin, Collagen, and DHT Blockers for Thinning Hair, 8 fl. oz.
product_meta.description:
Pronexa Clinical Strength Hair Regrowth Therapy Hair Loss Shampoo uses a powerful combination of cutting edge ingredients that work synergistically to create the ideal conditions for hair growth and regrowth while at the same time preventing hair loss by fortifying and strengthening your existing hair and follicles.

Our enriching formula includes aloe vera and seaweed extracts to deeply moisturize and heal your scalp while reducing hair thinning and shedding, and adding body, thickness, and volume to your hair. Pronexa DHT Blocker Shampoo also nourishes hair with vitamins and proteins, and it contains Biotin to help strengthen weak and brittle hair. Biotin is a B Vitamin that produces keratin, increases hair elasticity (minimizing breakage), and wraps your hair in a protective layer to prevent it from becoming brittle and weak. Biotin helps to induce growth of both your hair and new skin cells, making them healthy and vibrant. Ideal for all types of hair and the perfect choice for both men and women.

Clinical studies on hair loss have shown that the number one factor in hair loss is the production of dihydrotestosterone or DHT. DHT is a molecule inside of your body that's responsible for hair loss, so prohibiting the production of this hormone is key to preventing hair loss. Pronexa Biotin Shampoo contains Saw Palmetto and other powerful DHT blockers that help prevent DHT production. The result is that hair loss is stopped and hair growth and regrowth is thicker and healthier.

For the best results, use for at least 3 months with Pronexa Hair Loss Pills, Serum and Conditioner to stop hair loss, thicken hair, and see significant hair growth and regrowth. 100% money back guarantee! We want you to try and love our product risk free! If you do not see results from our product, send it back, and we will refund every penny of your purchase price.
feature_bullets: Hairgenics Hair Loss Shampoo and DHT Blocker for thinning hair is a Biobased Certified Product, Certified Organic Ingredients: Ultra Purified Water, Cocamidopropyl Hydroxysultaine, PEG-150 Distearate, Aloe Vera Extract, MSM, Biotinyl Tripeptide-1, Apigenin, Oleanic Acid, Saw Palmetto Extract, Glycol Monostearate, Sodium Chloride, Citric Acid, Biotin, EDTA, DMDM Hydantoin, Hydrolyzed Collagen, Seaweed Extract, Hydroxyethyl Cellulose, Enriched Vitamin B5, Fragrance, Hydrolyzed Silk Protein.

Contains clinically researched levels of hair growth vitamins such as Biotin, Vitamin B5, and Collagen Peptides for maximum hair regrowth and health. Biotin for hair growth not only promotes healthy hair growth but also prevents hair dryness. Biotin also increases the elasticity of the hair cortex, thereby strengthening hair, minimizing hair breakage and helping hair grow longer, healthier and thicker.

For the best results, use for at least 6 months and utilize the complete Pronexa Hair Care System including our Pronexa Hair Growth Supplement that nourishes hair from the inside out to achieve full, thick and healthy looking hair and stops hair loss and thinning in its tracks.

Scientific research on hair loss has shown that the number one factor in hair loss is the production of dihydrotestosterone or DHT. Pronexa Shampoo contains clinically proven DHT blockers including Saw Palmetto Extract which effectively block DHT and prevent hair loss. Pronexa Hair loss shamppo is safe for men and women of all ages.
Hairgenics products are NEVER tested on animals, and made in the USA. Only the best, and highest purity ingredients go into our products! 100% Money Back Guarantee for any reason.
